control.name: seRowHeight
control.description: Allows you to manually change the row height.

control.name: ceRowAutoHeight
control.description: This check box enables or disables the auto row height feature, which automatically adjusts the height of each data row to completely display the contents of its cells.

control.name: sbBestFit
control.description: Adjusts the columns width so that columns fit their contents in an optimal way.

control.name: ceEnabledMasterViewMode
control.description: Initially, all master row within a View are collapsed. They can be expanded either by end-users or via code in order to make their detail Views visible. This functionality is not available when the EnableMasterViewMode property is set to false.

control.name: sbExpandDetails
control.description: The ExpandAllGroups method expands all group rows within the current View. All data rows become visible as a result. End-users can also do this by using the group panel context menu.
